articles.description: In the first of our festival previews, we round up some of the best offerings we’ve already reviewed – including Tim Key, Liz Kingsman, La Clique and Hungry
articles.content:
Sound Cistem
This searing, sweaty disco is a heady exploration of identity through dance. Ayden Brouwers and Lizzie Morris interviewed transgender and non-binary people aged between 18 and 25. Dista… [+12887 chars]
